1.name: Spider-Man 2
1.description: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.

2.name: The Notebook
2.description: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.

3.name: White Chicks
3.description: Two disgraced FBI agents go way undercover in an effort to protect hotel heiresses the Wilson Sisters from a kidnapping plot.

4.name: Mean Girls
4.description: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.

5.name: Hellboy
5.description: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

6.name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
6.description: It's Harry's third year at Hogwarts; not only does he have a new "Defense Against the Dark Arts" teacher, but there is also trouble brewing. Convicted murderer Sirius Black has escaped the Wizards' Prison and is coming after Harry.

7.name: Van Helsing
7.description: The notorious monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for some sinister purpose.

8.name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
8.description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

9.name: Troy
9.description: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.

10.name: National Treasure
10.description: A historian races to find the legendary Templar Treasure before a team of mercenaries.

11.name: The Incredibles
11.description: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

12.name: Saw
12.description: Two strangers, who awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there, soon discover they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious serial killer.

13.name: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
13.description: A group of misfits enter a Las Vegas dodgeball tournament in order to save their cherished local gym from the onslaught of a corporate health fitness chain.

14.name: The Phantom of the Opera
14.description: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a disfigured and murderous musical genius who lives beneath the Paris Opéra House.

15.name: The Girl Next Door
15.description: A teenager's dreams come true when a former porn star moves in next door and they fall in love.

16.name: Man on Fire
16.description: In Mexico City, a former assassin swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

17.name: The Day After Tomorrow
17.description: Jack Hall, paleoclimatologist, must make a daring trek from Washington, D.C. to New York City to reach his son, trapped in the cross-hairs of a sudden international storm which plunges the planet into a new Ice Age.

18.name: Napoleon Dynamite
18.description: A listless and alienated teenager decides to help his new friend win the class presidency in their small western high school, while he must deal with his bizarre family life back home.

19.name: Starsky & Hutch
19.description: Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red and white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of a police snitch called "Huggy Bear".

20.name: The Aviator
20.description: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s.

21.name: The Butterfly Effect
21.description: Evan Treborn suffers blackouts during significant events of his life. As he grows up, he finds a way to remember these lost memories and a supernatural way to alter his life by reading his journal.

22.name: Shaun of the Dead
22.description: A man's uneventful life is disrupted by the zombie apocalypse.

23.name: Collateral
23.description: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles.

24.name: Blade: Trinity
24.description: Blade, now a wanted man by the FBI, must join forces with the Nightstalkers to face his most challenging enemy yet: Dracula.

25.name: 13 Going on 30
25.description: A girl makes a wish on her thirteenth birthday, and wakes up the next day as a thirty-year-old woman.

26.name: 50 First Dates
26.description: Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment up until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams, until he discovers she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day.

27.name: The Village
27.description: A series of events tests the beliefs of a small isolated countryside village.

28.name: The Machinist
28.description: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

29.name: I, Robot
29.description: In 2035, a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot, which leads to a larger threat to humanity.

30.name: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
30.description: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

31.name: The Punisher
31.description: An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante assassin and sets out to unleash his wrath upon the corrupt businessman who slaughtered his entire family at a reunion.

32.name: Crash
32.description: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

33.name: Hauru no ugoku shiro
33.description: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

34.name: Dawn of the Dead
34.description: A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman, and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall.

35.name: EuroTrip
35.description: Dumped by his girlfriend, a high school grad decides to embark on an overseas adventure in Europe with his friends.

36.name: Layer Cake
36.description: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

37.name: Closer
37.description: The relationships of two couples become complicated and deceitful when the man from one couple meets the woman of the other.

38.name: Million Dollar Baby
38.description: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

39.name: Der Untergang
39.description: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

40.name: Taking Lives
40.description: An FBI profiler is called in by French Canadian police to catch a serial killer who takes on the identity of each new victim.

41.name: The Terminal
41.description: An Eastern European tourist unexpectedly finds himself stranded in JFK airport, and must take up temporary residence there.

42.name: 9 Songs
42.description: In London, intense sexual encounters take place between an American college student, named Lisa, and an English scientist, named Matt, between attending rock concerts.

43.name: Sideways
43.description: Two men reaching middle age with not much to show but disappointment embark on a week-long road trip through California's wine country, just as one is about to take a trip down the aisle.

44.name: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
44.description: Ron Burgundy is San Diego's top-rated newsman in the male-dominated broadcasting of the 1970s, but that's all about to change for Ron and his cronies when an ambitious woman is hired as a new anchor.

45.name: The Chronicles of Riddick
45.description: The wanted criminal Riddick arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.

46.name: The Passion of the Christ
46.description: Depicts the final twelve hours in the life of Jesus of Nazareth, on the day of his crucifixion in Jerusalem.

47.name: The Bourne Supremacy
47.description: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

48.name: Shrek 2
48.description: Princess Fiona's parents invite her and Shrek to dinner to celebrate her marriage. If only they knew the newlyweds were both ogres.

49.name: King Arthur
49.description: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

50.name: Seed of Chucky
50.description: Chucky and Tiffany are resurrected by their innocent son, Glen, and hit Hollywood, where a movie depicting the killer dolls' murder spree is underway.
